scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts && npm run types:copy
scripts.build:wasm: npm run build:wasm:node && npm run build:wasm:web
scripts.build:wasm:node: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="wasm_js"' wasm-pack build ../crates/raito-spv-verify-wasm --release --target nodejs --out-dir dist/node --out-name index && mkdir -p dist/node && cp -r ../crates/raito-spv-verify-wasm/dist/node/* dist/node/
scripts.build:wasm:web: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="wasm_js"' wasm-pack build ../crates/raito-spv-verify-wasm --release --target web --out-dir dist/web --out-name index && mkdir -p dist/web && cp -r ../crates/raito-spv-verify-wasm/dist/web/* dist/web/
